title: [CL5] Ranked Team "Centrelink 5" RECRUITING (Plat+ Preferred)
body:
Looking to build a ranked 5's team that will hopefully hit Plat or Diamond before season 6. Focusing on recruiting players that are frequently available so we can get a lot of games in and learn each others play styles. Voice communication is a must, preferably Skype. Aiming to be a serious team and will go through and figure out team comp's and strategies based on players best champions. Don't worry if you haven't played a lot of 5's before since i'll be trying to keep strategies, compositions and shot calling as simple as possible and as we learn how we play, will move onto more complex strategies. 

If you're interested, fill out the form below in the comment section. Plat+ is preferred, however, if you have good stat's at Gold, you will still be considered. 


Summoner Name:
Age:
Main Role:
Main Champion(s):
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking:
Forms or voice communication:
Times and Days available through out the week:
Why you want to join:

Thanks! :)

replies.body:
Summoner Name: Blueeeeeeeeeeeee
Age: 17
Main Role: ADC
Main Champion(s): Favorite champion to play is Vayne but can play most adc's.
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Plat 5 
Forms or voice communication: I have Ts / skype / raidcall can download any comms if required. 
Times and Days available through out the week: Monday - thurs and sunday= 4pm - 11pm Nzt. Fridays / sat = anytime 
Why you want to join: I used to play alot of ranked teams with mates, highest we got to was g1. I really like the competitive side in ranked 5's and playing as a team. I would also like to improve as a player and would take constructive criticism to heart. It would be cool to play in an environment where everyone is keen to learn and accept feedback and learn from their mistakes, form strategies and lastly to have fun and enjoy each other companies. I think that is what's important. :)

Summoner Name: BigDogTim
Age: 15
Main Role: ADC/Jungle
Main Champion(s): ADC : Kalista, Jinx, Vayne, Graves, Corki
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Gold 3 promos to Gold 2
Forms or voice communication: Skype
Times and Days available through out the week: Monday-Thursday: After 4:30 Friday: After 8 Saturday-Sunday: All day unless something comes up.
Why you want to join: I feel like this is a prime opportunity for me to get into a good team. I like playing 5's and love to learn as a team! <3

Summoner Name: Tung
Age: 19
Main Role: Mid / Top / Jg
Main Champion(s): Ahri, Fizz, Yasuo (changes over time, Can play anything)
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: D4
Forms or voice communication: Skype / Ts3 / Vent / Mumble
Times and Days available through out the week: All weekdays (6 onwards), Weekend (anytime)
Why you want to join: Played LoL since S1, and have tried ranked teams before (but just for fun). Enjoy playing as part of a team, and always playing to improve mechanically and strategically. Recently been looking for a more serious / progressing ranked team

Summoner Name: Rocka
Age: 19
Main Role: Jungle/support
Main Champion(s): Zac, rek'sai, thresh
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Platinum 3
Forms or voice communication: Skype, teamspeak
Times and Days available through out the week: mon-fri 6pm + weekends all day
Why you want to join: I have always wanted to become better and dreamed of being in the OPL and this is just the first step to getting there.

Summoner Name: Renai and Celia
Age: 18
Main Role:  mostly Support, but also ADC
Main Champion(s): Thresh
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Plat 2, Plat 3
Forms or voice communication: TS3
Times and Days available through out the week: Weekdays 4pm-9pm, Weekends: from the point I wake up-2am
Why you want to join: Playing in a team environment is always more fun than solo queue

Age: 20
Main Role: adc or top
Main Champion(s): graves corki vayne ganhplank
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: plat 5
Forms or voice communication: skype
Times and Days available through out the week: 3-12pm
Why you want to join: I want to join a serious team who is aiming for the highest rank posible

Summoner Name: bapitixo
Age: 23
Main Role: adc/sup
Main Champion(s): Vayne, jinx, corki, tristana... thresh,leona,blitz,morg,braum,naut
CURRENT Solo/Duo Queue Ranking: Dia 5
Forms or voice communication: Skype, TS, Axon
Times and Days available through out the week: all days (Study at home)
Why you want to join: Been looking for a team that has individuals with a higher understanding and skillset so that when it comes to 5's we know who to focus, how to communicate that and to keep everyone aware of what's going on around the map while in-game (harder to find than you may think)
